reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress chic and well-made, with flattering draping that hugs curves.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for a party..elegant, comfy, and flattering!
items.body: I wore this dress to a Filipina debut party and got so many compliments! I wanted something that looked classy but still had that subtle glam, and this dress delivered. The satin fabric is beautiful and looks more expensive in person. It flowed really nicely and had a soft shine that looked great in photos. The ruching is super flattering, it hugged in the right places without feeling tight, and the lapel with the button-down design gave it a more elevated vibe than a basic satin dress. I felt super confident wearing it. I went with the navy color and paired it with some simple heels and gold jewelry, and the whole look came together effortlessly. The dress does run a bit long if you're on the shorter side (I'm around 5'2"), so it looked more like a maxi on me, which I didn‚Äôt mind at all, it made it feel even more formal. The slit on the side added a nice touch too, not too high, just right for moving and dancing comfortably. Honestly, it‚Äôs one of those dresses you can rewear to other events like weddings or special dinners. It‚Äôs comfortable, elegant, and makes you feel put-together without trying too hard. I‚Äôm already eyeing another color! Read more
items.author: Sarlyn/Angelica

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dress is stunning
items.body: This dress looks good on all body types. The fabric feels great against your skin and keeps you cool in the heat of summer. Length is just below the knee but you can adjust where it buttons to for the look you want. Well made and hides all the right places while emphasizing the others Read more
items.author: Jesabella

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, comfortable, but very wrinkly
items.body: This was my first choice to wear to speak at a conference, and when I first tried it on I absolutely loved it. I was so excited to wear it at the conference, unfortunately, it was really difficult to get the wrinkles out. It looked like it had been crumpled in a bag for the last three years even with the hotel steamer I could not Make it suitable to wear in public. I think it would be a great option if you‚Äôre not traveling, and it doesn‚Äôt have to be packed into a suitcase. Other than the wrinkles, it is a beautiful color, a great fit, very soft and very comfortable and appropriate for either a business meeting or a more casual wedding guest look. Read more
items.author: Jessica Harding

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful!
items.body: It hangs well and helps hide belly fat, elegant and casual. BUT, the fabric will show EVERYTHING. Panty lines, cellulite, rolls, etc. You'll likely need a slip, or at least a bodyshaper and no show panties. Also the static cling can get pretty bad, which does NOT help with the aforementioned issues. Despite all of that, I love how it feels and how it looks. It's stretchy and flexible, with cool, smooth fabric. Would buy again... actually might buy a different color right now! Read more
items.author: Grace

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Size up for the loose, gathered, ruched look.
items.body: This made for a really comfortable, stylish dress for a wedding. I wouldn't recommend wearing this dress in cooler climates, it is good quality but it's nice and breezy and actually cools you off. There isn't much stretch but this dress is meant to fit loose to gather in all the right places. I sized up and it really was perfect. Like I said, it's a light functional dress. You can dance the night away. It is not lined but the material is completely opaque and very wearable. My stance doesn't do this dress any favors in the picture. It fits nicely to your curves and if you have a little waist you want to show off, this a a guarantee attention getter. üíØ Read more
items.author: Lou Guinn

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and comfy
items.body: Super cute and flattering. I don't ordinarily wear green, but loved it. I got many compliments on the dress. Read more
items.author: lynn bartlett

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not for me, but you may like it!
items.body: Originally I thought I would wear this dress to a holiday party, but I didn't love the material as I felt like it looked cheapish and I didn't like the tie waist. I also don't think it is holiday party worthy, but it would be a good work dress. I did like the waist, it felt like it hugged in the right places but wasn't tight to make you feel uncomfortable or like you needed to suck in your stomach. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great dress! Size up!
items.body: 5‚Äô5‚Äù, 165 pounds, long waist, shorter legs - Long read but worth your time - I am normally a large, but sized up in this dress. I first ordered the dress in the berry color in a large. First, I was disappointed with how muted the berry color was, and secondly, it was a little more fitted than what is shown on the model. And the loose fit on the model is what I was going for. Also, the button at my waist (the fullest part of me) had a small opening. The belt covered it up, but this made me feel like it was too small. So, I re-ordered in the x-large (and in green) and it fit more like what is shown on the model. As for the quality of the dress, it is a VERY thin material (the reason it gets 4 stars instead of 5), and it will show every dimple and crevasse back there. Lol. I wore some ‚Äúno show‚Äù underwear with this dress and you could even see outline of those. However this will not keep me from wearing it again. The belt is a great piece to cover the tummy if you‚Äôre self-conscious about it. It did such a good job at making me feel so put together and confident that I didn‚Äôt even wear tummy control underwear. This dress ended up being perfect for the occasion! I truly felt like a million bucks and felt so put together once I was done up for the event. I‚Äôve included pictures of the berry dress in large and the green XL straight out of the package, and included pictures of the winning dress at my event. Read more
items.author: Corey R.

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Short Sleeve Ruched Maxi Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Short Sleeve Ruched Maxi Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Light Red Khaki, Brilliant Blue, Deep Green, Dark Khaki, Grey Blue, Dusty Pink, Purple Red, Army Green, Light Green, Black, Dark Brown, Dark Green, Rose Red, Navy. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
